subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Police
lead_paragraph: One of the nation’s most sought-after recruits was charged with misdemeanor breaking and entering after the police found him walking out of a vacant house in Raleigh, N.C. John Wall, 18, was detained briefly April 27, but not arrested. He and two other teenagers were cited. The police said there was no indication of forced entry at the empty house or that anything was taken.
